00041     template< typename Ty, class Comp=std::less<Ty> >
00042     class IntervalDomain :public BasicInterval {
00043     public:
00045       typedef Ty base_type;
00046 
00057       class bound :public TREX::utils::istreamable,
00058                  public TREX::utils::ostreamable {
00059       public:
00066        bound(Ty const &val = Ty())
00067          :m_inf(false), m_value(val) {}
00074        bound(bound const &other) 
00075          :m_inf(other.m_inf), m_pos(other.m_pos),
00076           m_value(other.m_value) {}
00078        ~bound() {}
00079 
00088        bound &operator= (bound const &other) {
00089          m_inf = other.m_inf;
00090          m_pos = other.m_pos;
00091          m_value = other.m_value;
00092          return *this;
00093        }
00102        bound &operator= (Ty const &val) {
00103          m_inf = false;
00104          m_value = val;
00105          return *this;
00106        }
00107 
00115        bool isInfinity() const {
00116          return m_inf;
00117        }
00124        Ty const &value() const {
00125          return m_value;
00126        }
00138        bool operator< (bound const &other) const {
00139          if( m_inf ) 
00140            return !m_pos && ( other.m_pos || !other.m_inf );
00141          else if( other.m_inf )
00142            return other.m_pos;
00143          else {
00144            return s_cmp(m_value, other.m_value); 
00145          }
00146        }
00166        bool operator==(bound const &other) const {
00167          if( m_inf ) 
00168            return other.m_inf && (m_pos==other.m_pos);
00169          else 
00170            return !( other.m_inf || 
00171                     s_cmp(m_value, other.m_value) ||
00172                     s_cmp(other.m_value, m_value) );
00173        }
00180        bool operator!=(bound const &other) const {
00181          return !operator==(other);
00182        }
00189        bool operator> (bound const &other) const {
00190          return other.operator< (*this);
00191        }
00198        bool operator<=(bound const &other) const {
00199          return !operator> (other);
00200        }
00207        bool operator>=(bound const &other) const {
00208          return !operator< (other);
00209        }
00210        
00219        bound const &min(bound const &other) const {
00220          if( operator< (other) )
00221            return *this;
00222          else
00223            return other;
00224        }
00233        bound const &max(bound const &other) const {
00234          if( operator< (other) )
00235            return other;
00236          else
00237            return *this;
00238        }
00239 
00252        bound plus(bound const &other, bound const &onInf) const;
00265        bound minus(bound const &other, bound const &onInf) const;
00266          
00267       private:
00269        static Comp s_cmp;
00276        bool m_inf;
00282        bool m_pos;
00288        Ty  m_value;
00289 
00298        bound(bool pos, bool) 
00299          :m_inf(true), m_pos(pos) {}
00300 
00301        std::istream &read_from(std::istream &in);
00302        std::ostream &print_to(std::ostream &out) const;
00303                      
00304        friend class IntervalDomain<Ty, Comp>;
00305       }; // IntervalDomain<>::bound

00312       static bound const plus_inf;
00318       static bound const minus_inf;
00319       
00326       explicit IntervalDomain(TREX::utils::Symbol const &type)
00327        :BasicInterval(type), m_lower(minus_inf), m_upper(plus_inf) {}
00339       IntervalDomain(TREX::utils::Symbol const &type, 
00340                    bound const &lb, bound const &ub)
00341        :BasicInterval(type), m_lower(lb), m_upper(ub) {
00342        if( m_upper<m_lower || ( m_lower.isInfinity() 
00343                              && m_upper==m_lower ) ) {
00344          throw EmptyDomain(*this, "interval domain is empty");
00345        }
00346       }
00355       IntervalDomain(TREX::utils::Symbol const &type, Ty const &val) 
00356        :BasicInterval(type), m_lower(val), m_upper(val) {}
00358       virtual ~IntervalDomain() {}
00359       
00367       bool contains(Ty const &val) const {
00368        return val==closestTo(val);
00369       }
00370 
00384       Ty const &closestTo(Ty const &val) const {
00385        bound me(val);
00386        
00387        if( m_lower>me )
00388          return m_lower.value();
00389        if( m_upper<me ) 
00390          return m_upper.value();
00391        return val;
00392       }

00418        return m_lower;

00427        return m_upper;

00429 
00430       bool isSingleton() const {
00431        return m_lower==m_upper;
00432       }
00433 
00434       bool hasLower() const {
00435        return !m_lower.isInfinity();
00436       }
00437       bool hasUpper() const {
00438        return !m_upper.isInfinity();
00439       }
00440 
00441       boost::any getLower() const {
00442        return m_lower.value();
00443       }
00444       boost::any getUpper() const {
00445        return m_upper.value();
00446       }
00447       
00461       void getBounds(bound &lo, bound &hi) const {
00462        lo = m_lower;
00463        hi = m_upper;
00464       }

00472       IntervalDomain(IntervalDomain const &other)
00473        :BasicInterval(other), m_lower(other.m_lower), m_upper(other.m_upper) {}
